item.title: How to use Picasa with iOS5
item.description: I’m mostly writing this post because I had a fairly hard time finding a resolution to a real pesky error. For some reason, my iPhone 4S was recognized by Picasa but always failed to import photos. Whenever I tried, the Picasa was clearly scanning through the files and then presented this error: An error has occurred while attempting to import. Either the source is unavailable or the destination is full or read only (1).
